column4: based on the rub and the flavor
column5: I'd give them a 4.  But my half slab included the rib tips
column6: which should have been trimmed off.  The bones in what I received were only about an inch long
column7: and the rib tips (with cartilage) comprised the rest of the length. They were average in meatiness
column10: I was expecting more. My husband's full slab was fine.
